SAFE_EDIT_NOTE: SAFE EDIT ZONE: Add or adjust abilities inside abilities[]. Keep id unique, cost 1..8, and timing exactly buildPhase or detonation.

abilities.name: Brace Formation
abilities.text: Gain +1 shieldCap this round. Adjacent allies count as protected for simple shield synergies.

abilities.name: Charge Coil
abilities.text: Prepare 1 charge. If already charged, gain a minor precision tag instead.

abilities.name: Sightline Mark
abilities.text: Mark a target lane. The next detonation against that lane is treated as precise.

abilities.name: Guard Shift
abilities.text: Reposition guard priority. This card can intercept one incoming hit for an ally.

abilities.name: Pressure Stack
abilities.text: Create a pressure stack. Detonation gains a bonus rider if the stack is consumed.

abilities.name: Reserve Shielding
abilities.text: Bank a reserve shield point for later detonation resolution.

abilities.name: Clean Strike
abilities.text: Deal a direct, no-frills precision hit.

abilities.name: Line Break
abilities.text: Push damage through light protection and force a lane trade.

abilities.name: Reactive Burst
abilities.text: If shield or charge was prepared, convert it into a stronger burst effect.

abilities.name: Suppressed Volley
abilities.text: Fire a controlled volley that reduces the target lane's next attack pressure.

abilities.name: Overload Step
abilities.text: Spend prepared charge to trigger an overload detonation with bonus reach.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.text: A high-risk finishing blast that peaks when the target is already pressured.

abilities.name: Blood Oath Sigil
abilities.text: Swear a minor oath. This card gains loyalty until it detonates.

abilities.name: Covenant Aegis
abilities.text: Raise formation shielding shared with adjacent allies for the next clash.

abilities.name: Lineage Invocation
abilities.text: Invoke a bloodline rite. Prepare charge and empower another loyal ally's next detonation.

abilities.name: Choir of Shields
abilities.text: Stack harmonious shields. Gains extra value if multiple Hearts are present.

abilities.name: Votive Blade Ready
abilities.text: Consecrate the weapon. Next detonation counts as ritual-forged.

abilities.name: Noble Formation Rite
abilities.text: Complete a grand rite that hardens the line and rewards disciplined positioning.

abilities.name: Oathbound Lunge
abilities.text: Strike harder if this unit remained in formation since build phase.

abilities.name: Crimson Reprisal
abilities.text: Convert a portion of shielding into retaliatory damage.

abilities.name: Heraldic Breaker
abilities.text: Spend loyalty stacks to unleash a ceremonial finishing strike.

abilities.name: Pledgekeeper Surge
abilities.text: Detonate in-step with nearby allies to press the center lane.

abilities.name: Aegis Bloom
abilities.text: Detonate a shield bloom that protects allies while punishing overextension.

abilities.name: Bloodline Verdict
abilities.text: Deliver a bloodline verdict whose impact scales with loyal units in play.

abilities.name: Intercept Grid
abilities.text: Establish an intercept lane and designate a protected ally.

abilities.name: Suppression Order
abilities.text: Issue a suppression order. Target lane loses momentum next detonation.

abilities.name: Armor Audit
abilities.text: Reinforce tactical armor and set a countermeasure trigger.

abilities.name: Countermeasure Packet
abilities.text: Upload a packet that improves the next intercept or reveals an enemy trick.

abilities.name: Doctrine Drill
abilities.text: Drill the line. Gains value when allies hold rank order.

abilities.name: Magistrate Lockdown
abilities.text: Declare lockdown. Enemy lanes are constrained unless they break formation.

abilities.name: Breach Citation
abilities.text: A disciplined strike that hits harder against marked offenders.

abilities.name: Shield Bash Warrant
abilities.text: Use armor mass to stagger the target and suppress retaliation.

abilities.name: Intercept Fire
abilities.text: Detonate only after an enemy commits; punish the lane with precise return fire.

abilities.name: Suppression Barrage
abilities.text: Blanket a lane in disciplined fire, reducing enemy attack pressure.

abilities.name: Counterseal Verdict
abilities.text: Cash in a countermeasure to seal a lane and deliver a punishing verdict.

abilities.name: Blacklist Execution
abilities.text: Execute a predesignated target with exacting force if prior marks were applied.

abilities.name: Probability Sketch
abilities.text: Forecast likely lane outcomes and gain a precision tag.

abilities.name: Prism Calibration
abilities.text: Tune prism gear to prepare charge and improve the next accurate strike.

abilities.name: Outcome Hedge
abilities.text: Hedge against failure. Gain a defensive fallback if detonation underperforms.

abilities.name: Fragment Read
abilities.text: Read a fragment of possible futures at a toll and mark the safest lane.

abilities.name: Vector Partition
abilities.text: Partition firing vectors to avoid ally interference and sharpen aim.

abilities.name: Continuum Tax
abilities.text: Pay a toll to bend a timeline branch and bank superior charge output.

abilities.name: Needle Forecast
abilities.text: A precise thrust guided by immediate probability readouts.

abilities.name: Prism Lance
abilities.text: Convert charge into a focused prism lance attack.

abilities.name: Curve Correction
abilities.text: Correct an unfavorable lane outcome and strike where defenses thin.

abilities.name: Fractal Volley
abilities.text: Split a volley into calculated fragments to pressure multiple angles.

abilities.name: Predicted Collapse
abilities.text: Trigger a collapse at the point the model says the enemy line fails.

abilities.name: Zero-Variance Kill
abilities.text: Spend the prepared state to deliver a nearly certain lethal sequence.

abilities.name: Scrap Plate Weld
abilities.text: Weld on scavenged plates. Gain rough shielding with a chance to crack later.

abilities.name: Pocket Lift
abilities.text: Steal a spark from the field and convert it into charge.

abilities.name: Corrosion Paste
abilities.text: Prime a target lane with corrosive paste for later detonation payoff.

abilities.name: Jury-Rig Booster
abilities.text: Assemble a risky booster that grants charge and unstable momentum.

abilities.name: Tunnel Tribute
abilities.text: Sacrifice a small resource to empower a later detonation and salvage gain.

abilities.name: Black-Market Wiring
abilities.text: Splice illegal wiring to siphon charge and copy part of an enemy setup.

abilities.name: Rivet Hook
abilities.text: Hook and yank the target line, opening space for allied pressure.

abilities.name: Acid Spit Canister
abilities.text: Burst a corrosive canister that weakens armor and shield value.

abilities.name: Stolen Trigger
abilities.text: Use a stolen trigger profile to mirror a lower-cost detonation rider.

abilities.name: Scrapyard Blast
abilities.text: Detonate loose salvage in a brutal blast that thrives in crowded lanes.

abilities.name: Corrosion Cascade
abilities.text: Trigger all prepared corrosion to collapse layered defenses at once.

abilities.name: Debt Collector Bomb
abilities.text: Spend stolen charge and tribute to deliver a devastating settlement blast.

abilities.name: Shard Whisper
abilities.text: Listen to a shard whisper and gain a distorted future cue with a drawback.

abilities.name: Mask Swap
abilities.text: Swap persona masks, changing how this Joker's detonation interprets prepared states.

abilities.name: Fracture Appetite
abilities.text: Consume a controlled resource to amplify chaotic shard resonance.

abilities.name: Liar's Stage
abilities.text: Set a false state on the board; the detonation reveals which side gets punished.

abilities.name: Shard Bloom
abilities.text: Explode into flying shards that hit unpredictably but always leave a mark.

abilities.name: Guaranteed Betrayal
abilities.text: A promised betrayal fires: an ally or enemy condition is inverted for explosive gain.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.text: Rip a narrow tear through the field and force a violent resolution in one lane.

abilities.name: Laughing Collapse
abilities.text: A catastrophic collapse whose payout spikes when multiple states were contradicted.
